notes: Revolutionary aerodynamic design with unibody construction. Advanced engineering for era. Inline-8 flathead engines. Complex vintage restoration requires specialized knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Airflow article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Conventional styling companion to Airflow. Available with inline-6 or inline-8 flathead engines. Complex vintage mechanics. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Airstream article, January 17, 2025 revision.

Flagship luxury model with large inline-8 flathead engines. Custom coachwork available. Complex vintage restoration with rare parts. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Imperial article, January 17, 2025 revision.
Entry-level Chrysler with inline-6 flathead engine. Standard pre-war complexity. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Royal article, January 17, 2025 revision.
Short-lived mid-range model with inline-6 flathead. One year only in 1930s. Complex vintage mechanics. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Saratoga article, January 17, 2025 revision.
